nosotrosas and vosotrosas forms dont have a stem change  INFINITIVE VERB STEM STEM CHANGE CONJUGATED FORM  empezar empez empiez empiezo   volver volv vuelv vuelvo   In many other verbs such as volver to return  the stem vowel changes from   o to ue The nosotrosas and vosotrosas forms have no stem change   To help you identify stemchanging verbs they will appear as follows  throughout the text 42 Stemchanging verbs  eie oue Stemchanging verbs deviate from the normal pattern of regular verbs  Note the spelling changes to the stem in the conjugations below Singular forms  yo vuelvo  t vuelves
